title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7306.8 - Contraband
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7306.8 - Contraband

State Regulations
(a) Youth searches
shall be conducted solely to inspect for contraband or to recover missing or
stolen items. (b) The disposition
of discovered contraband shall be made in accordance with Part 7305 of this

Title. (c) Nothing in this section
shall limit or restrict a facility from using electronic devices during the
search of youth, visitors, facilities, or secure grounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7306.8

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
